language.entry: Two expirienced members of the Order of Sunlight arrive in the hamlet. Following th path of the sun, they praise the magnificent celestial body. A beacon of hope in these dark times.

With the very first ray of sunlight, breaking through the darkest night, an imposing silhouette appeared on the horizon. A radiant presence emanates from them. The sun's order claims "The Chosen has arrived"
In Radiance may we find Victory
The glaring sun, breaks through the clouds. The surrounding lands are illuminated by its magnificent presence.
Once in a while the order holds a procession to dub new members. All Sunlight's adherents participating will have the chance to increase their faction rank.
Block 2 negative Quirk Slots Wears of if {colour_start|notable}Trinket "Sacred Ash"{colour_end} not equipped
{colour_start|notable}{?hero_name}%s{colour_end} has deepened their devotion to the sun and became a {colour_start|wos_rarity}Sunlight's Adherent{colour_end}.
{colour_start|notable}{?hero_name}%s{colour_end} has deepened their devotion to the sun and became a {colour_start|wos_rarity}Sunlight's Disciple{colour_end}.
{colour_start|notable}{?hero_name}%s{colour_end} had a radiant epiphanay and became a {colour_start|wos_rarity}Sunlight's Chosen{colour_end}.
In Radiance may we find Victory !
Zenith's Edge {colour_start|specificclass}[Use on {colour_start|wos_rarity}Chosen of Sun{colour_end} only]{colour_end}
Forbidden Sun {colour_start|specificclass}[Use on {colour_start|wos_rarity}Chosen of Sun{colour_end} only]{colour_end}
Summoning Kiln {colour_start|specificclass}[Use on {colour_start|wos_rarity}Chosen of Sun{colour_end} only]{colour_end}

{colour_start|buff}Buff{colour_end} {colour_start|wos_rarity}Order Members:{colour_end} +5%% DMG per Faction {colour_start|specificclass}Faction Rank{colour_end} {colour_start|skill_unselectable}(1 rd){colour_end}

+100%% {colour_start|stress}Stress{colour_end} healed when idle in Town Friendly Skill: Proselytize {colour_start|wos_rarity}Order Member{colour_end} {colour_start|skill_unselectable}(10%% ){colour_end}
More Stress healed with high {colour_start|stress}Stress{colour_end} More Stress healed if {colour_start|afflicted}Afflicted{colour_end}

+5%% {colour_start|debuff}Debuff{colour_end} Chance per 25 {colour_start|wos_rarity}Torchligh{colour_end} On Hit: {colour_start|debuff}Debuff Target {colour_end}{colour_start|skill_unselectable}(100%% base):{colour_end}
For each 10 {colour_start|wos_rarity}Torchlight{colour_end}: +3%% CRT multiplicator +3%% Armor Piercing
For each 10 {colour_start|wos_rarity}Torchlight{colour_end}: +5%% DODGE multiplicator +5%% SPD multiplicator
The sun is like a magnificent father
You don't look hollow far from it
The sun is like a magnificent father
My past settles like the sun at dusk. My Deeds are redeemed.
The Sun glitters lie Gold, fine enough ...
This order keeps marvlous riches, would be sad if someone dies with them.
I would loose my last eye to gaze at the magnificent sun
Stubborn gold flowers Resist a cold wind lit by A fast-dipping sun
Atleast this order is not chaste
The Flame is just a spark compared to the magnificent sun
The Flame is just a spark compared to the magnificent sun
I will be your everwatching sentinel, like the glorious sun
Burn of my sins in this glorious light
Oh Sun, cauterize my wound, slooooowly ...
Call me Daywalker from now on
The sun reveals the deepest desires
The Sun, great guardin, father of life
I heard of cities made full of gold
The Sun shines brighter than gold
Gold looks even better in pure sunlight
In the desert the sun is your only company
In the desert the sun is your only company
In this brighness nobody can hide!
Oh Sun,urn out the evil residing in me
The sun is like a magnificent father
You don't look hollow far from it
The sun is like a magnificent father
You don't look hollow far from it
Sacred rite written by the order of sun. Evolves the Quirk {colour_start|quirk_positive}Disciple of Sunlight{colour_end} to {colour_start|quirk_positive}Chosen of Sunlight{colour_end}
Glowing resin, used for holy rituals. Imbued weapons are powered by Torchlight
Heavy sap shining like molten led. Increase {colour_start|stun}Stun{colour_end} & {colour_start|move}Move{colour_end} chance. Decrease SPD
Two expirienced members of the Order of Sunlight arrive in the hamlet. Following th path of the sun, they praise the magnificent celestial body. A beacon of hope in these dark times.

With the very first ray of sunlight, breaking through the darkest night, an imposing silhouette appeared on the horizon. A radiant presence emanates from them. The sun's order claims "The Chosen has arrived"
In Radiance may we find Victory
The glaring sun, breaks through the clouds. The surrounding lands are illuminated by its magnificent presence.
Once in a while the order holds a procession to dub new members. All Sunlight's adherents participating will have the chance to increase their faction rank.
Block 2 negative Quirk Slots Wears of if {colour_start|notable}Trinket "Sacred Ash"{colour_end} not equipped
{colour_start|notable}{?hero_name}%s{colour_end} has deepened their devotion to the sun and became a {colour_start|wos_rarity}Sunlight's Adherent{colour_end}.
{colour_start|notable}{?hero_name}%s{colour_end} has deepened their devotion to the sun and became a {colour_start|wos_rarity}Sunlight's Disciple{colour_end}.
{colour_start|notable}{?hero_name}%s{colour_end} had a radiant epiphanay and became a {colour_start|wos_rarity}Sunlight's Chosen{colour_end}.
In Radiance may we find Victory !
Zenith's Edge {colour_start|specificclass}[Use on {colour_start|wos_rarity}Chosen of Sun{colour_end} only]{colour_end}

Sacred rite written by the order of sun. Evolves the Quirk {colour_start|quirk_positive}Disciple of Sunlight{colour_end} to {colour_start|quirk_positive}Chosen of Sunlight{colour_end}
Glowing resin, used for holy rituals. Imbued weapons are powered by Torchlight
Heavy sap shining like molten led. Increase {colour_start|stun}Stun{colour_end} & {colour_start|move}Move{colour_end} chance. Decrease SPD
Two expirienced members of the Order of Sunlight arrive in the hamlet. Following th path of the sun, they praise the magnificent celestial body. A beacon of hope in these dark times.

With the very first ray of sunlight, breaking through the darkest night, an imposing silhouette appeared on the horizon. A radiant presence emanates from them. The sun's order claims "The Chosen has arrived"
In Radiance may we find Victory
The glaring sun, breaks through the clouds. The surrounding lands are illuminated by its magnificent presence.
Once in a while the order holds a procession to dub new members. All Sunlight's adherents participating will have the chance to increase their faction rank.
Block 2 negative Quirk Slots Wears of if {colour_start|notable}Trinket "Sacred Ash"{colour_end} not equipped
{colour_start|notable}{?hero_name}%s{colour_end} has deepened their devotion to the sun and became a {colour_start|wos_rarity}Sunlight's Adherent{colour_end}.
{colour_start|notable}{?hero_name}%s{colour_end} has deepened their devotion to the sun and became a {colour_start|wos_rarity}Sunlight's Disciple{colour_end}.
{colour_start|notable}{?hero_name}%s{colour_end} had a radiant epiphanay and became a {colour_start|wos_rarity}Sunlight's Chosen{colour_end}.
In Radiance may we find Victory !
